name: convoo-workspace
description: Workspace para o projeto Convoo - FETIN 2025

scripts.db-migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db-migrate-deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db-reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db-seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
